website_summaries.verdict: Buy the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ if you love the idea of a wraparound screen; otherwise, you'll be able to find less expensive phones that do nearly as much.
pros: Samsung's Galaxy S6 Edge+ has a compelling design, top-tier specs and excellent battery life
Its second menu for the curved display adds some useful shortcuts
cons: One of the most expensive handsets on the market, the Edge+'s usefulness doesn't live up to its sky-high price
Fans of removable batteries and microSD card slots will be disappointed that this has neither

customer_reviews.title: Never buy refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about receiving this phone unfortunately I'm returning it in less than 24 hours of use because the screen went out. What a shame. I never buy refurbished and i never will again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer 227

customer_reviews.title: The edge is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone two years ago. Still have it. It "replaced" my Note 5. Let's be honest, my Note 5 is the best phone I had. This phone is a close 2nd. Very close. I love the edge with the clock. It's perfect for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kara LaMarca

customer_reviews.title: Horrible phone, drained battery and bad customer support.
customer_reviews.text: After four months the phone will not hold a charge, turns off randomly, super glitchy, and battery last like two hours. Customer support just says "sorry nothing we can do" For the money you waste on this you think it would last more than four months.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: The phone came in pretty rough shape
customer_reviews.text: The phone came in pretty rough shape. The price is good but the shape of the phone was not. The fingerprint option did not work half the time. I’m pretty disappointed. I really wanted to go from and iPhone to android. But I will be returning this phone and continue to use my iPhone. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This phone is absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This phone sporadically refused to fast charge. Switched to other Samsung OEM chargers. Sometimes worked. Now the phone's been plugged in for 18 hours and it's at 26%. I want my money back.

customer_reviews.title: this is a great phone with lots of memory
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is a great phone with lots of memory! My only concern is that the battery needs to be recharged a lot compared to my old iphone6. I find that this is normal with Galaxy phones, though.

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far does more than I will ever ...

My son talked me into getting this phone because he has one and had also ordered from Amazon. Love it so far does more than I will ever have time to learn and use.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, but problems with seller
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as refurbished, it's not. Advertised to work with Sprint, does not work with prepaid plans (I switched to Ting). Phone arrived almost a week late, but I was reimbursed for shipping. Otherwise, I am happy with the phone. Great camera quality, ample storage.

Due to my current phone completely dying on me I had not choice but to keep it at this point. I guess Im not disappointed in the phone itself just the supplier!

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Buyer BEWARE! This phone continues to revert to Sprint when I try to search the Internet. When I took it to the Verizon store, I was told the phone was likely a Sprint phone that was converted to a Verizon phone. At certain times, it will search for Sprint network, it will drain the battery. This happens randomly. I tried to return the phone, but was told I was a few days too late. The phone was advertised as a new VERIZON phone; however, it keeps trying to open up websites through Sprint. I have had nothing but trouble with it, and I would not recommend purchasing from this seller.

I saved big bucks getting it here than through Verizon's website. Since I was looking to save, I did not mind the color. This is a much larger phone than my old one, but it's so awesome I can live with that. I've had it for several months now and it's a fantastic phone.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my wife. She was so excited when she got it. Until we went to put SIM card in to find out the sim tray was missing. What type of business does tht? I paid big money for a incomplete used phone. Had to spend another 18 dollars for a replacement tray and wait to activate it. Word of advice make sure you buy all new products. This is sh**ty

customer_reviews.title: Received product with scratches and dents on the side. ...

customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Used-Like New Galaxy S6 Edge+ from Edge Cellular...... Yup, LIKE NEW!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone!! Bought it for myself. Used-Like New condition, From Edge Cellular. When it arrived, it came in a plain box with an original charger. The phone was exactly as described. Like new condition!!! Screen was pristine, it still had some of the original plastic protection cover on some of the sensors and camera lens. Couldn't find a scratch on any part of the glass, front or back. There was some edge wear on the metal but it was not noticeable unless you were looking for it. If I ever need to upgrade or replace this phone I will definitely check out what Edge Cellular is offering because when they say LIKE NEW it is LIKE NEW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Austreng01

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of bells and whistles until it's pushing up daisies.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and took great pictures, at least until it died, and I mean it just died. No warning. No errors. It just bricked. On one second, gone the next. It has no damage to it and it's never been submerged, and absolutely no unauthorized apps. It lasted just past the warranty, which is ridiculous. I have a flat screen TV that's lasted 5 years and Samsung can't make a smart phone that lasts longer than 2 years. For $450 I would expect a bit more longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Teal

customer_reviews.title: These phones do not have place for sd card.
customer_reviews.text: Had bruised place under screen when I got it out of box to charge it. Before I ever activated. Then noticed small lines through screen.. Making words and letters not clear. Small chip on corner bottom opposite of the bruise like spot in top right area.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from ordering this product on this platform . Charger that came with phone does not charge phone I am using a old phone charger , I am starting to believe what others are saying which is Amazon is a platform for companies to sell below quality name brand products. Update now the phone will not charge , stay away from this seller/priduct!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great overall phone
customer_reviews.text: Substitute for Note 7. Its a great phone but lacks my note 7 pen and screen real estate. I look forward to the next generation of Samsung phones. The S7 is a good basic all around phone that will not disappoint for those who don't need the business function of the note series. I would recommend this phone to anyone! Great photos, clear calling and great to play games on!
customer_reviews.author: Lori K. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Most features work...
customer_reviews.text: As usual for a refurb. Nfc doesn't work. I returned my last refurb because of this because I'm sick of having to carry a wallet again. Everything else works fine. Looks like I'll just have to buy a new phone if I want everything to work though.
customer_reviews.author: deimos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, excellent phone condition!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to purchase a cell phone online after reading mixed reviews. I am very glad that I made the purchase. I ordered a Verizon compatible phone because that is the service I wanted to transfer to. The phone is in excellent condition even the rep at the Verizon store commented that it was one of the best refurbished that she had seen. All of my services transferred over, I was able to sync my previous apps. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MargB

customer_reviews.title: I love the phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone, works as expected. The only part I don't like is I ordered as used-like new and there are pixels up on the left hand side that are dead. They're not noticeable really but me being the person I am noticed it shortly after switching my service to the phone. It doesn't affect seeing anything since it's at the very top, just irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Dealy

customer_reviews.title: Could not activate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday and attempted to activate it to our Verizon account and were unsuccessful. After 3 hours of phone calls and visits to the Verizon store with 2 new sim cards, the phone was found to be defective. This was very upsetting as it is a birthday gift for my son, so much for the suprise! Returning this and not purchasing online again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: WARNING Warranty void
customer_reviews.text: Warning, buying this phone through Arad System is viewed as an unauthorized reseller by Samsung and voids the warranty. The processor fails on this phone in less than a year. So you'll be throwing you're money away if you buy this phone.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+, Gold 32GB (AT&T)
product_meta.description: Service Provider:AT&T| Color:Gold| Size:32 GBACCEPTABLE (2/5) - Shows signs of significant wear and tear, will have scuffs, scratches, dents and/or housing marks. May have LCD halo or other useable screen discolorations. Product is fully functional and tested. A standard US home charger is included. SIM card not included. ESN has been verified as clear to use with Verizon prepay network.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars179 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Pre-Installed SIM Card, Wall Charger, Samsung S6 Edge+, USB Cable
